As long as you have the scopes, you should have no problem checking if the property already exists, and if not, create it.
What problem are you having creating the deal property?
The deal property is a *property sync field type*. Is it possible to create this field when installing our HubSpot public app via the API or through another method?

That’s the real question. It’s not so much a problem of creating properties during installation. The question is ‘can I create a Sync Property via API?’ I’d say the answer to that today is no. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/crm/properties|https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/crm/properties>
